attributes.action: Make Britain act against countries stoning gay people to death
attributes.additional_details: Britain needs to fight back and address this as we are going backwards in time rather than forwards
attributes.background:
It is now legal to stone gay people to death in 
Syria , Nigeria , Sudan , Yemen ,Pakistan , Brunei 
Iran , Saudi Arabia

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

There's already a petition asking the UK Government to call for an end to LGBT human rights violations in Brunei. You might like to sign this petition. You're more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251142
